name: No Cook Marshmallow Frosting
author: Shirley Drury
instructions: Beat egg whites and salt with beater until soft peaks form. Add sugar, about 1 tablespoon at a time, beating until smooth and glossy. Continue beating and add Karo syrup, a little at a time, beating after each addition, until frosting peaks. Fold in vanilla. Makes enough to frost two 9 inch layers.
